name: Classic Espresso
description: A shot of rich and intense espresso to kickstart your day.

name: Cappuccino Bliss
description: A perfect blend of espresso, steamed milk, and frothy foam, topped with a sprinkle of cocoa.

name: Vegetarian Breakfast Wrap
description: A wholesome wrap filled with scrambled eggs, veggies, and cheese. Served with a side of salsa.

name: Blueberry Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes loaded with fresh blueberries, drizzled with maple syrup and topped with whipped cream.

name: Mushroom Truffle Risotto
description: Creamy risotto cooked with mushrooms and truffle oil, garnished with Parmesan cheese.

name: Turkey Club Sandwich
description: Layers of turkey, bacon, lettuce, and tomato stacked between slices of toasted bread. Served with fries.

name: Fruit Medley Smoothie
description: A refreshing blend of assorted fruits, yogurt, and honey, perfect for a healthy boost.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Indulge in a warm and gooey chocolate lava cake, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Grilled Salmon Salad
description: A light and nutritious salad featuring grilled salmon, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
description: Chilled espresso poured over ice, sweetened with caramel syrup and topped with frothy milk.
